items.name: Freeform
items.metaDescription: Freeform is a super flexible form-building tool that’s perfect for whatever project you’re working on! Its easy-to-use builder makes creating forms a piece of cake. Plus, it works great with your go-to CRMs and email marketing tools.

items.name: Calendar
items.metaDescription: Calendar is an effective event management and calendaring plugin. Its user-friendly interface simplifies the creation of events with complex recurring rules and exclusions.
